src_original: śraddhendriyaṃ vīryendriyaṃ smṛtīndriyaṃ samādhīndriyaṃ prajñendriyam iti //
sa karmavipākapratiśaraṇo bhavati /  yad yat karma kariṣyāmi tasya tasya karmaṇaḥ phalavipākaṃ pratyanubhaviṣyāmīti /  sa jīvitahetor api pāpaṃ karma na karoti /
bodhisatvacārikām abhiśraddadhāti /  taccaryāpratipannaś cānyatra yāne spṛhāṃ notpādayati /
yān dharmān śraddhendriyeṇa śraddadhāti tān dharmān vīryendriyeṇa samudānayatīdam ucyate vīryendriyaṃ //
